title: Acupuncture & Oriental Medicine in California | Athreya Ayurveda
author: ALISSA MORENO
description: Embrace the healing power of the age old Oriental medicine and Acupuncture to be relieved of ailments and for better health. Consult our Acupuncture experts today.
cleaned_text: What is Acupuncture? Acupuncture is a traditional chinese practice that involves puncturing points on the body that increase blood and energy flow to open energy pathways. The procedure is accompanied by unique massage techniques, herbs and diet to manage diseases. The benefits of Acupuncture The use of needles is one of the ancient techniques used in traditional Chinese medicine. In this technique, sterile needles are inserted into specific points in the body to stimulate the flow of energy ("qi") thereby helping the body's natural healing response. Pain Management Acupuncture addresses and heals chronic pain and helps in pain management. Beauty Enhancement Cosmetic acupuncture is effective in preventing premature wrinkling of facial skin.
